BV Pet Training Pads for Dogs and Puppies BV Pet waste management and dog behavior worry-free training product. We are helping you to maintain your home a pleasant and clean environment for your pets. 6 Layers Technology Heavy duty super absorbent core turns urine to gel. Locks the liquid in the middle layers. The standard size pad can hold up to 4 cups of liquid. Protection Lining 100. The bottom layer is made of PE plastic material. It can protect your carpet and floor from leaking.Control the odors of urine from spreading in the space.  Shop with confidence BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs. Our goal is your 100% satisfaction.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10 x 9 x 8 inches; 4 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ BV-PE-PADS-34
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 22, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BV
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07ZG5J985

Leak-proof plastic lining and locking layers protect the floor and carpet.
6 layers.Pad dimension: 28 x 34 inches. 40-count.
Provide easy training and odor control with built-in attractant.
Great quality guarantee. One-year limited warranty included

Read more

About BV Pet

BV is continuously improving and evolving for our customer needs.

Our goal is your satisfaction.

BV Training Pads for Dogs and Puppies

BV Pet waste management and dog behavior training product.

We are helping you to maintain your home a pleasant and clean environment for your pets.

  • Heavy duty absorbent core can hold up to 2 cups of liquid(22″x22″,100cts); 4 cups of liquid (28″x34″, 40cts)
  • Leak-proof plastic lining and locking layers protect the floor and carpet.
  • Provide easy training and odor control with built-in attractant.
  • 2 Sizes Available: 22″x22″(100cts); 28″x34″(40cts)

Read more

Multiple Layer Protection

  1. Quilted Top Layer
  2. Dry Sheet
  3. Pet Attractant to Draw In Dog
  4. Absorbent Core Turns Liquid To Gel
  5. Locking Layer
  6. Protection Liner

Read more

Super Absorbent Core.

Heavy duty super absorbent core turns urine to gel – locks the liquid in the middle layers – to eliminate stains and odors quickly.

High Quality Top Layer.

Flash-dry technology designed to dry the surface quickly.

Leak-Proof.

The bottom layer is made of PE plastic material. It can protect your carpet and floor from leaking.

Read more

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

Read more

GREAT CHOICE FOR YOUR PETS – IMMCUTE Pet Training and Puppy PadsA clean and fresh-smelling home that every pet parent and dog deserves. IMMCUTE pet training pads are ideal for puppies and dogs that stay indoors for long periods of time.All-day ProtectionIt can provide all-day protection for the puppy or senior dog potty training, making your cleanup a breeze and saving you much time.Made of High-quality Materials

  • Non-woven Fabrics
  • Tissue Paper
  • Super Absorbent Polymer (SAP)
  • Fluff Pulp
  • Tissue Paper
  • Waterproof Polyethylene (PE Film)

IMMCUTE dog pee pads are made of high-quality materials, more durable than most pet training pads on the market.6-layer ProtectionThe 6-layer protection technology makes it super absorbent and leak-proof to protect your floors or carpets by preventing leaks. And the absorbent polymer layer instantly turns liquid into a gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.Multiple UsesThe puppy pads usually placed in pet crates or kennels, pet pad holders, paper boxes, or put under the dog bowl or on the car backseat to keep clean.Not Only for Dogs, But Also for Other PetsOur pee pads/potty pads are oriented to a wide range of animals, not just for dogs but also for other pets, like kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks, guinea pigs, squirrels, etc.Note:

  • Please measure and determine the size you need before purchasing.
  • Please allow 0-0.4″ error due to manual measurement.
  • Always remember to dispose of soiled dog potty pads and replace them as needed.

【SUPER ABSORBENT & THICKER】Thickened wee wee pads for dogs and 6-layer protection design makes our XL dog pee pee pads more absorbent than the most puppy potty pads on the market.
【QUICK-DRYING】Unique flash-dry technology quickly turns liquid into gel, preventing tracking, liquid overflow, and bad smell.
【LEAK-PROOF】Each pet training pad features a plastic backing and border to protect your floors or carpets by blocking leaks for 24 hours.
【ALL DAY PROTECTION】Our puppy pads pet training pads are a great solution for multi-dog homes and pets that need to stay inside for a long period of time.
【XLARGE SIZE】28″ W x 34″ L(71.1cm x 86.4cm).Our magic pee pads are perfect for puppies, senior or sick dogs, kittens, cats, rabbits, ducks and other pets. Not only for your indoor use but also for outdoor use (especially use during travel or the leisure time on the lawn).

From the brand

Grenebo is a representation of a traditional brand of handcrafted gardening tools. With perfection at heart, Grenebo is committed to making the beauty of gardening accessible to all

We have been working with vendors from around the world to bring you fashionable, unique, and high-quality gardening products

With the support of our products, we aim to help people all around the world “Enjoy the Beauty of Gardening” by making it simpler & more fun

Top Sale Products

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

Other Grenebo Products on Sale

【All you need in one Kit】With so many different things to grow, from vegetables to herbs, planting can require multiple tools to get the job done. With Grenebo Garden Tool Set, cut back on clutter in the garage, this set will meet all of your planting and gardening needs.
【Durable, High Quality】Grenebo gardening tools made from forged stainless steel, can withstand the toughest roots, rocks, and soil. A practical tool of reducing fatigue and helping planting more easily for all gardeners.
【Functional Tools】Hand Trowel: transplanting, filling & composting; Hand Fork: aerating, chopping, sifting, digging & loosing; Hand Weeder: cutting, uprooting, weeding & braking; Garden Shears: trimming & pruning. With them make it easy for us to deal with any difficult problem encountered in garden work.
【Efficient and Practical】Whether you are a first-time gardener or a professional farmer, this basic 8-piece garden tool set will make you feel amazing and practical at the same time. Besides, it will become one of your favorite garden tools, the best gift to families or friends.
【Comfortable Experience】 With wood handles make for an ergonomic and comfortable grip. For the smooth and bright surface, this garden work set will be clean as new again only need to be rinsed with water after use.

Grenebo Garden Tool Set


If the courtyard is the habitat of the body, then garden tools set is the beginning of everything!

Grenebo gardening tools are made with heavy-duty stainless steel, and the wooden ergonomic handles keep you comfortable and reduce fatigue.

Stainless Steel Hand Weeder

Size: 1.18*12.2 Inch

Ideal for removing weeds and roots while protecting surrounding plants well.

Hand 3 Prong Cultivator

Size: 3.3*9.2 Inch

Ideal for digging, scratching, aer-ating and loosening soil when preparing to plant flowers and vegetables

Size: 2.1*8.6 Inch

Ideal for transplanting plants in pots, basins, bedding areas and borders.

Stainless Steel Hand Fork

Size: 3.3* Inch

Ideal for use in borders amd raised beds. It is the efficiency to remove weeds, planting and cultivating.

Whether they can prevent rusting, or would them rust after use for a period of time?

They are made of rustproof stainless steel. After using each time, the resin and sludge deposited on the surface of the hand tool should be cleaned. [Had better not store in a damp place]

Does this gardening tools set come in a box?And can I regard this garden set as a gift?

Yes, it comes in a patterned box, you just need to wrap and decorate it with gift wrapping paper to make a beautiful gardening gift for women friends.

Is this garden kit suitable for beginners?

Sure, our Grenebo gardening tools for women/men contains 9 piece garden hand tool you need to start gardening, It suits all gardeners and hobbyists, even garden gurus, and it’s easy to start your own garden life, and enjoy the beauty of gardening.
